   16: -module(last_SUITE).
   17: -compile(export_all).
   18: 
   19: -include_lib("escalus/include/escalus.hrl").
   20: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
   21: 
   22: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   23: %% Suite configuration
   24: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   25: 
   26: all() ->
   27:     [{group, last}].
   28: 
   29: groups() ->
   30:      [{last, [sequence], test_cases()}].
   31: 
   32: test_cases() -> [last_online_user,
   33:                  last_offline_user,
   34:                  last_server].
   35: suite() ->
   36:     escalus:suite().
   37: 
   38: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   39:     escalus:init_per_suite(Config).
   40: 
   41: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   42:     escalus:end_per_suite(Config).
   43: 
   44: init_per_group(_GroupName, Config0) ->
   45:     Config1 = escalus:create_users(Config0, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])),
   46:     Config2 = escalus:make_everyone_friends(Config1),
   47:     escalus_ejabberd:wait_for_session_count(Config2, 0),
   48:     Config2.
   49: 
   50: end_per_group(_GroupName, Config) ->
   51:     escalus:delete_users(Config, escalus:get_users([alice, bob])).
   52: 
   53: init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   54:     escalus:init_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   55: 
   56: end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config) ->
   57:     escalus:end_per_testcase(CaseName, Config).
   58: 
   59: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   60: %% Last tests
   61: %%--------------------------------------------------------------------
   62: last_online_user(Config) ->
   63:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}, {bob, 1}],
   64:                   fun(Alice, _Bob) ->
   65:                           %% Alice asks about Bob's last activity
   66:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:last_activity(bob)),
   67: 
   68:                           %% server replies on Bob's behalf
   69:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   70:                           escalus:assert(is_last_result, Stanza),
   71:                           0 = get_last_activity(Stanza)
   72:                   end).
   73: 
   74: last_offline_user(Config) ->
   75:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   76:                   fun(Alice) ->
   77:                           %% Bob logs in
   78:                           {ok, Bob} = escalus_client:start_for(Config, bob, <<"bob">>),
   79: 
   80:                           %% Bob logs out with a status
   81:                           Status = escalus_stanza:tags([{<<"status">>, <<"I am a banana!">>}]),
   82:                           Presence = escalus_stanza:presence(<<"unavailable">>, Status),
   83:                           escalus_client:send(Bob, Presence),
   84:                           escalus_client:stop(Bob),
   85:                           timer:sleep(1024), % more than a second
   86: 
   87:                           %% Alice asks for Bob's last availability
   88:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:last_activity(bob)),
   89: 
   90:                           %% Alice receives Bob's status and last online time > 0
   91:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
   92:                           escalus:assert(is_last_result, Stanza),
   93:                           true = (1 =< get_last_activity(Stanza)),
   94:                           <<"I am a banana!">> = get_last_status(Stanza)
   95:                   end).
   96: last_server(Config) ->
   97:     escalus:story(Config, [{alice, 1}],
   98:                   fun(Alice) ->
   99:                           %% Alice asks for server's uptime
  100:                           Server = escalus_users:get_server(Config, alice),
  101:                           escalus_client:send(Alice, escalus_stanza:last_activity(Server)),
  102: 
  103:                           %% Server replies with the uptime > 0
  104:                           Stanza = escalus_client:wait_for_stanza(Alice),
  105:                           escalus:assert(is_last_result, Stanza),
  106:                           true = (get_last_activity(Stanza) > 0)
  107:                   end).
  108: 
  109: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  110: %% Helpers
  111: %%-----------------------------------------------------------------
  112: get_last_activity(Stanza) ->
  113:     S = exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"query">>}, {attr, <<"seconds">>}]),
  114:     list_to_integer(binary_to_list(S)).
  115: 
  116: get_last_status(Stanza) ->
  117:     exml_query:path(Stanza, [{element, <<"query">>}, cdata]).
